pkgmetadata.longdescription: Relative Risk Based on the Ratio of Median Unbiased Estimates // Implements an estimator for relative risk based on the median unbiased estimator. The relative risk estimator is well defined and performs satisfactorily for a wide range of data configurations. The details of the method are available in Carter et al (2010) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9876.2010.00711.x.
